attributes.action: Make it against the law to ride a bicycle on the road without a helmet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Both children and adults who cycle on our roads are in danger of having possibly fatal accidents that will substantially reduced if more people used helmets.
 In our cars which are substantially safer than bicycles, it is against the law to not wear our seatbelts and so with bicycles who's riders are in more danger should be made to wear helmets for their own benefit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
